snippet: Prosecutors said Laura Pendergest-Holt gave misleading testimony in the investigation of the $7 billion Ponzi scheme organized by R. Allen Stanford.
abstract: Laura Pendergest-Holt, former chief investment officer of the Stanford Financial Group, is sentenced to three years in prison for her role in helping convicted swindler R Allen Stanford bilk investors out of more than $7 billion in the Ponzi scheme he organized.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Laura Pendergest-Holt gave misleading testimony in the investigation of the $7 billion Ponzi scheme organized by R. Allen Stanford.

headline.seo: Pendergest-Holt of Stanford Group Gets Prison Term
headline.main: Stanford Group Executive Is Sentenced to Three Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Stanford Group Executive Is Sentenced to Three Years in Prison
